title: US Supreme Court lets Trump pursue deportations under 1798 law, with limits
author: John Kruzel and Andrew Chung
summary: The U.S. Supreme Court has allowed former President Donald Trump to use the Alien Enemies Act to deport Venezuelan migrants accused of being gang members. However, the court placed limits on the deportations, stating detainees must be notified and allowed to seek habeas relief.
quote: The Supreme Court has upheld the Rule of Law in our Nation by allowing a President, whoever that may be, to be able to secure our Borders, and protect our families and our Country, itself.
